<The Grass Mud Horse
1:
--------------------
Text: Grass Mud Horse:  It is a play on the Mandarin words "cào nǐ mā" (肏你妈 ), literally, "fuck your mother", and is one of the so-called 10 mythical creatures created in a hoax article on Baidu Baike in early 2009 whose names form obscene puns.
Triplets:<Grass Mud Horse
2:
--------------------
Text: Grass Mud Horse:  It has become an Internet chat forum cult phenomenon in China and has garnered worldwide press attention, with videos, cartoons and merchandise of the animal (which is said to resemble the alpaca), having appeared.
Triplets:<Grass Mud Horse
